title: 6 Hollywood Love Stories
description: Nina Dobrev and Ian Somerhalder's split is one of six captivating Hollywood love stories unfolding, with Billy Crudup and Naomi Watts' marriage also frequently making headlines
content:
Love is in the air among some of your favorite Hollywood stars. The Vampire Diaries universe is more than just a TV show; it’s practically Cupid’s playground. Stars like Nina Dobrev and Ian Somerhalder made fans giddy with their real-life romance before their eventual split. Meanwhile, Candice King found love on set not once, but twice!

Over in the world of first responders, the 9-1-1 cast has its own whirlwind romances. High-profile relationships include the enduring partnership of Angela Bassett and her real-life love, Courtney B. Vance, adding a dose of reality to their respective fictional dramas. Bradley Cooper and Gigi Hadid are making waves as they navigate their lived-in-the-moment relationship, often seen out and about in NYC, while Kylie Jenner and Timothée Chalamet enjoy their courtside dates with ease. In other news, Billy Crudup‘s journey from Mary-Louise Parker to Naomi Watts has been a captivating ride, with his happy ending in sight after marrying Watts. Even more, DWTS pros Emma Slater and Alan Bersten are dancing off the stage, sealing their romance with sweet public displays of affection and adorable social media posts. It’s a season of love, and we’re here for every captivating moment.
• NO. 1: A GUIDE TO EVERY OFFSCREEN COUPLE FROM 'THE VAMPIRE DIARIES' UNIVERSE
• NO. 2: '9-1-1' CAST'S DATING HISTORIES THROUGH THE YEARS: ANGELA BASSETT, MORE
• NO. 5: BILLY CRUDUP’S DATING HISTORY: FROM MARY-LOUISE PARKER TO NAOMI WATTS
• NO. 6: ‘DWTS' PROS ALAN BERSTEN AND EMMA SLATER KISS IN PDA-PACKED PHOTOS
summary: The Vampire Diaries universe is experiencing a resurgence of love, with stars such as Nina Dobrev and Ian Somerhalder enjoying real-life relationships. The 9-1-1 cast has also had their own whirlwind romances, with Angela Bassett and Courtney B. Vance enduring their relationship. Other notable relationships include Ashley Ashley from The Walking Dead and Emma Slater from DWTS.
shortSummary: The Vampire Diaries, 9-1-1, and DWTS stars like Angela Bassett and Candice King are among the top Hollywood romances, with notable relationships highlighted by their real-life relationships.

scraped_sources.text:
Bradley Cooper and Gigi Hadid have made major headlines since kicking off their whirlwind romance in October 2023.
The pair sparked dating rumors after they were photographed together in New York City. Despite their 20-year age difference, Hadid and Cooper “have a lot in common,” a source told Us Weekly at the time.
“They’re both single parents to a young daughter, and they share a similar sense of humor,” the insider said, adding that they had “been out a couple of times” after meeting through a mutual friend. (Hadid shares daughter Khai with ex-boyfriend Zayn Malik while Cooper shares daughter Lea De Seine with ex-girlfriend Irina Shayk.)
The same source told Us that the duo was “really enjoying spending time” together. “It’s still far too early to know where things might be headed,” the insider continued, noting that “things aren’t that serious right now [but] the attraction is there.”
Since then, the duo has continued to grow stronger together. While they don’t speak publicly about their romance, Hadid and Cooper haven’t kept their relationship a total secret. On more than one occasion, they’ve been spotted holding hands during an NYC date night.
Keep scrolling to see Hadid and Cooper’s complete relationship timeline:
October 2023
Hadid and Cooper sparked romance rumors with a source telling Us that they’re “really enjoying spending time” together.
A separate insider told Us that Taylor Swift was providing “a low-key place” for Hadid and Cooper to “meet up” amid their budding romance.
November 2023
Hadid and Cooper “discussed” a possible playdate with their daughters Khai and Lea De Seine, a separate source told Us as the duo have “grown closer.”
December 2023
They subtly acknowledged their relationship when Hadid used Cooper to promote her luxury brand Guest in Residence. The brand’s official Instagram shared a story of Cooper wearing a flannel “shacket” from the brand.
That same month, Hadid was also spotted supporting Cooper when he served cheesesteaks from a food truck in New York City. Another source offered Us a major update on the status of their relationship as well.
“They haven’t had ‘the talk’ in terms of their relationship status, but neither of them is seeing [anyone else],” the insider revealed, noting that things between them have been “going really well.”
Later that month, Us confirmed that Cooper had purchased a house in New Hope, Pennsylvania, where Hadid also owns a residence. While a second source said it had “nothing to do” with his and Hadid’s relationship, the duo was still going strong.
“Things are going great with Bradley and Gigi and they’re really enjoying spending time together,” the second insider continued.
February 2024
The couple were photographed together on a date at Breakfast by Salt’s Cure in New York City.
April 2024
Hadid and Cooper jetted off with pal Swift and her boyfriend, Travis Kelce, for a couples’ getaway to Carmel-by-the-Sea, California, according to Travis’ mom, Donna Kelce. The trip came shortly after Swift released her double album The Tortured Poets Department.
May 2024
The pair were spotted at Swift’s final Eras Tour stop in Paris on May 12. Hadid and Cooper were seen dancing to the singer’s biggest hits alongside Travis in a private box, per social media footage.
Later that month, the model and Cooper rocked out to Stevie Nicks’ set at BottleRock Napa Valley festival on May 24. Hadid wore a white hoodie and baby blue baseball cap while singing along during the performance, according to social media clips. Cooper, meanwhile, was seen holding onto Hadid’s hand throughout the concert.
October 2024
Hadid made a rare comment acknowledging Cooper when she was asked if he would watch her walk the runway at the Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show. “He’s watching from home tonight. He is on dad duty,” Hadid told Entertainment Tonight before the event.
November 2024
Cooper and Hadid enjoyed a Broadway date night, watching Alyssa Milano play Roxie Hart in Chicago. The actress shared photos of the couple posing with her backstage at Ambassador Theater. Days later, the duo were spotted wearing coordinating red and white outfits while in New York City.
January 2025
@myboybraids Eagles Football 🏈#philadelphiaeagles #fyp #bradleycooper #gigihadid
The pair were spotted cheering on the Philadelphia Eagles as they played against the Los Angeles Rams during the January 19 NFL playoff game. Cooper and Hadid, who both own property in Pennsylvania, were captured screaming for the Eagles as they beat the Rams 28-22, according to a fan video shared via TikTok.
Hadid donned a letterman-style green and blue jacket (which are a few of the team’s colors), a matching scarf and black jeans as she stood beside her boyfriend in box seats. Cooper wore an Eagles bomber jacket for the occasion.
May 2025
Hadid finally went Instagram Official with Cooper more than a year into their relationship in honor of her 30th birthday. As part of a carousel of Instagram photos from her birthday bash, Hadid shared one shot showing her kissing Cooper and cradling his face in front of a three-tiered chocolate cake.
“I feel so lucky to be 30,” Hadid wrote. “I feel so lucky for every high and low — for all the lessons and gifts both have brought me. To get to feel it all! I’m so lucky to be a mom, friend, partner, sister, daughter, colleague to some of the most unbelievable humans!!”
The model went on, “So lucky for the support and encouragement from all of YOU around the world, every day and on my birthday last week. I had the best time celebrating, and it’s a blessing to feel so loved!! I am grateful and honored to take on a new decade.”

As Alan Bersten and Emma Slater concluded their Dancing With the Stars Live tour run, they sealed their final duet with a kiss.
Bersten, 30, and Slater, 36, closed out the evening with a sizzling routine during the Saturday, April 19, show in Rosemont, Illinois. In now-viral social media footage, Bersten could be seen pulling Slater in for a sweet smooch at the end as audience members erupted in cheers.
The two DWTS pros have not formally addressed their relationship status before Saturday’s kiss, though a source exclusively told Us Weekly in late 2024 that Bersten and Slater were “hooking up.”
According to the insider, Bersten and Slater are not an out-in-the-open couple, but their romance was “not new” and “ongoing.”
Slater was previously married to fellow DWTS pro Sasha Farber for four years, ultimately filing for divorce in February 2023.
“We’re still like family, so it isn’t really like the love is not there, it’s actually not that at all,” the British dancer said during an August 2023 appearance on “The Viall Files” podcast. “We’re just at potentially two different places. But the hard part was that the love actually didn’t go [away].”
At the time, Slater said their breakup came down to “the kid thing.”
“It’s interesting because I do want to have kids. I just don’t want to delay Sasha’s path in having kids because I know that he is ready for that,” Slater said. “I don’t want to talk about him too much because that’s really for him to say, but it’s about kids. I do want kids. I don’t know what it is, I’m just figuring that out for myself. It’s not something I take lightly and I don’t want to enter into something that I’m not sure about because I would never do that.”
Slater further noted that she and Farber, 40, did speak about expanding their family throughout their marriage, but she started to feel a “resistance” in the end.
“So, that’s been the real friction and the real hard part,” Slater admitted. “It had nothing to do with him. He’s always been very much himself. It’s me that’s found it difficult to understand why I’m feeling different.”
Slater and Farber still remain on amicable terms, especially while they both still perform on DWTS.
“We really are close friends,” Slater told Us in June 2024. “He’s somebody who’s in my life forever. It’s a true genuine connection and he’s the best person, just absolutely amazing. We just get on really, really well.”
Bersten, for his part, previously dated his DWTS season 27 partner Alexis Ren before they split in December 2018.

Tennis stars are making headlines in 2025 with milestone moments and candid revelations. Serena Williams dazzled fans at this year’s Met Gala, turning heads with her dramatic gown. Meanwhile, Coco Gauff captured her first French Open title in a stunning comeback, brushing off post-match criticism with poise and even offering a playful peek at her miniature winner’s trophy.
Off the court, Aryna Sabalenka set the record straight after facing backlash for her comments about Gauff, giving her fellow champ due credit while also praising her boyfriend’s role as her biggest supporter. And in a fun twist, Nick Kyrgios jumped into reality TV, hosting a new star-studded competition, showing tennis icons aren’t afraid to try something different. With candid moments, big wins and bold new ventures, these athletes are constantly serving up excitement both on and off the court.

Bachelor in Paradise season 10 is turning up the heat with love, drama and surprises all wrapped up in one summer spectacle! Contestants Jonathon Johnson and Hakeem Moulton previously told Us about their hopes of finding love, but they have differing views on whether they’re ready to propose. Meanwhile, sparks might fly again as Hannah Brown secretly roots for exes Susie Evans and Justin Glaze to rekindle their romance under the tropical sun to no avail. In another love triangle twist, Bailey Brown is caught in a dramatic tango with Jeremy Simon and a “secret rendezvous” with Brian Autz, leaving viewers on the edge of their seats.
But it’s not just about finding The One — this season adds thrilling games to the mix, with a tantalizing twist where contestants must choose between love and a hefty half-a-million-dollar cash prize, promising unexpected turns and decisions that will keep fans guessing.

Celebrity splits have shaken up the real estate scene, with stars parting ways with their shared homes. Ben Affleck and Jennifer Lopez have been in the midst of a tense back-and-forth about the sale of their once-shared Los Angeles mansion. While Lopez wants to hold out for a higher offer, Affleck is eager to sell quickly and move on. Meanwhile, Ariana Madix and Tom Sandoval are still navigating the sale of their home after a scandal-ridden breakup, with Madix juggling her new life while Sandoval remains in the house.
Elsewhere in the reality TV world, Jesse Lally and Michelle Saniei from The Valley are maintaining professionalism as they sell their luxurious property amidst their divorce, showing that even amidst personal turbulence, teamwork can lead to success. These high-profile separations are leaving some impressive properties up for grabs, with each former couple charting new paths post-breakup.

The Vampire Diaries didn’t just have countless couples on screen — many cast members found love with their costars or members of the extended franchise.
After The Vampire Diaries debuted on The CW in 2009, viewers quickly got invested in the supernatural events taking place in the fictional town of Mystic Falls, Virginia. At the center of the drama was Elena’s (Nina Dobrev) love triangle with Stefan (Paul Wesley) and Damon (Ian Somerhalder).
Off screen, Dobrev and Somerhalder sparked a romance in 2010 and continued to date for three years.
“The first time I was on the cover of Seventeen, the cover line said, ‘Nina: Why She Wouldn’t Date Any of Her Costars.’ And then cut to two years later, [I am],” Dobrev joked during an interview with Seventeen in October 2012. “It’s funny that I said that, but you know what? It was honestly what I believed at the time.”
She added: “I didn’t want to be dating one of my costars — my goal on the show was to be professional. But sometimes you can’t help who you have a connection with, and you can only fight it for so long — which I did for a really, really long time.”
The pair broke up in 2013, but continued to work together for two more seasons. After their split, Somerhalder moved on with Nikki Reed. They wed in 2015 and share two kids together. Dobrev, meanwhile, has been in a relationship with Shaun White since 2020.
Their costar Wesley was already married to Torrey DeVitto when she made multiple appearances on The Vampire Diaries, but following their divorce, he had a new offscreen love interest.
Wesley was linked to Phoebe Tonkin, who appeared on The Vampire Diaries and The Originals as Hayley. They dated on and off for four years before calling it quits.
Keep scrolling for more couples who happened behind the scenes of The Vampire Diaries:

Kelly Ripa is all about keeping it real when it comes to balancing her thriving career and vibrant family life. On a recent podcast, she opened up about the relief of her kids graduating without mountains of student debt, emphasizing the importance of a normal upbringing despite their famous last name. In a separate candid chat about parenting surprises, Ripa shared the unexpected news of being pregnant with her third child shortly after welcoming daughter Lola — a revelation that caught her completely off guard.
Meanwhile, cohosting Live with husband Mark Consuelos brings new dynamics to their marriage, and surprisingly, it means they see less of each other each day. Despite their busy schedule, the couple, who have been married for nearly three decades, credit their long-lasting relationship to mutual respect, shared interests and maintaining individuality.
- NO. 1: KELLY RIPA IS THANKFUL HER KIDS DON’T HAVE A ‘MOUNTAIN OF DEBT’
- NO. 2: KELLY RIPA HAD NO IDEA SHE WAS PREGNANT WITH JOAQUIN AFTER WELCOMING LOLA
- NO. 3: KELLY RIPA AND MARK CONSUELOS SEE EACH OTHER 'LESS' AS ‘LIVE’ COHOSTS

The first responders of 9-1-1 spend their days rescuing Los Angeles trapped in life-threatening situations, but they still find some time for a little bit of romance.
One of the show’s longest-running relationships is between police officer Athena (Angela Bassett) and firefighter Bobby (Peter Krause), who started dating at the end of season 1 and tied the knot in season 2. They’re essentially the mom and dad of the 9-1-1 crew, but even they’ve had their ups and downs.
“Both of them were somewhat lost, in terms of their romantic lives,” Krause told Entertainment Tonight of his onscreen partner in May 2021. “Bobby in particular, because of his past, was deeply wounded. What we’ve gotten to see over the seasons is that he’s really healed because [of his] loving relationship with Athena. There’s a lot more joy that Bobby takes in life.”
Athena and Bobby’s romance came to an emotional end in season 8, as the latter sacrificed himself to save Chimney (Kenneth Choi) from a deadly virus during the 9-1-1: Contagion two-part event in April 2025.
The Fox series is also famous for a relationship that’s so far remained platonic, much to the annoyance of some viewers: the bromance between Buck (Oliver Stark) and Eddie (Ryan Guzman). Their bond is so strong that in the season 4 finale, Eddie decided to change his will to give custody of his son Christopher (Gavin McHugh) to Buck in the event of his death.
“I know that there’s a contingent of fans that would like a certain outcome and the [relationship] has a life of its own in fandom in that respect,” showrunner Tim Minear told the Observer in May 2021. “But I do think that, look, at the very least, these are two guys who have a deep spiritual bond with each other.”
Keep scrolling for a look at the 9-1-1 cast’s real-life dating histories:

Kylie Jenner and Timothée Chalamet’s relationship appears to be going from strength to strength as they enjoy another casual date night.
The pair were photographed watching the New York Knicks play off against the Indiana Pacers at Madison Square Garden in New York City on Thursday, May 29.
Both Jenner, 27, and Chalamet, 29, opted for low-key looks for the casual affair, with the A Complete Unknown actor donning an orange and blue bomber-style jacket and the cosmetics mogul rocking a white T-shirt.
The couple were joined by fellow A-listers Miles Teller and Ben Stiller as they cheered on the basketball teams.
It’s not the first basketball game Jenner and Chalamet have been spotted at — they were also courtside to watch the Knicks take on the Boston Celtics on May 12.
Also this month the couple took a big step in the relationship by making their red carpet debut in Rome on May 7.
They coordinated their outfits for the event: the 70th David Di Donatello ceremony. Chalamet sported a black suit and Jenner posed in a black gown with a plunging neckline.
The outing was a big deal for the pair, who were first linked back in April 2023 following Jenner’s split from on-off boyfriend Travis Scott. (Kylie shares daughter Stormi, 7, and son Aire, 3, with Scott, whom she broke up with following the 2022 holidays.)
“Kylie’s really happy and relieved they finally made their debut. It was time and she wanted to publicly support him and show how proud of him she is,” a source exclusively told Us Weekly following their red carpet debut. “She and Timothée have gotten really serious, and this was a big step.”
The insider added that Jenner and Chalamet’s red carpet milestone in Rome wasn’t the only major step forward for the couple.
“They are practically living together at this point, as he stays at her house often when he is not working,” the source said. “He has been fully integrated into her life.”
While the pair has kept their relationship relatively low-key, they have begun to make more and more public appearances in recent months. As well as the Knicks games and their red carpet debut in Rome, Jenner and Chalamet attended the Oscars together in March as well as an L.A. Lakers game in April.
“Everything is going really well,” the source told Us in May. “[Kylie is] proud to stand by him and felt like it was the right time to share that part of their relationship. They are in a really good place. He makes her feel calm and confident and it is a different relationship from what she has had in the past.”

Bachelor in Paradise season 10 is shaking things up with unexpected twists, bold new faces and plenty of jaw-dropping moments. Franchise alum Dale Moss makes a dramatic return, sparking a new romance with Kat Izzo, who is also back after her BiP broken engagement. The season surprised viewers with a fresh shooting style, a new tropical setting, and the addition of the Golden alums, whose carefree attitudes and wisdom made waves among the younger cast.
On top of all that, a cash prize raises the stakes with the cast taking on wild compatibility tests, couple shakeups and other post-villa romances. This season of BiP is proving you can never predict what will happen next in Paradise.

Billy Crudup had a few high-profile relationships before settling down and finding his happily ever with Naomi Watts.
Crudup began dating Mary-Louise Parker in 1996 after meeting as costars in the Broadway play Bus Stop. The Almost Famous actor made headlines when he ended his relationship with Parker, who was seven months pregnant with their son William at the time, in 2003 to pursue a romance with Claire Danes. Danes and Crudup dated until 2006.
“That was really hard. I didn’t know how to not do that,” Danes said in an October 2015 appearance on The Howard Stern Show. “I was just in love with him. And [I] needed to explore that and I was 24. … I didn’t quite know what those consequences would be.”
Crudup later moved on with Watts in 2017 after meeting her while working on Netflix’s Gypsy. The couple confirmed that they tied the knot in June 2023.
“They wanted to keep it low-key and have this moment to themselves, and they pulled it off beautifully,” an insider told Us Weekly at the time, calling the pair’s nuptials “stress-free” and “spur of the moment.”
Keep scrolling to learn more about Crudup’s relationship history:
Mary-Louise Parker
Crudup and Parker began dating after appearing in the Broadway play Bus Stop together in 1996. In 2003, when Parker was seven months pregnant with William, Crudup left her to pursue a relationship with Danes. She gave birth to their son in January 2004.
Following their son’s birth, Crudup emailed a New York Times interviewer writing a piece about him, requesting that “anything about the Mary-Louise Parker situation” be left out. The actor noted to the reporter that the matter was “personal, painful and involves an infant.”
While Parker has never directly mentioned what happened, in her 2015 memoir, Dear Mr. You, she alluded to the situation with Crudup. She recalled telling a cab driver that she was “pregnant and alone” and that it “hurts to even breathe.”
The twosome proved they were on good terms when Crudup attended the International Women of Vision Awards in New York City with William in 2019 to support Parker, who was being honored for her charitable work at the David Lynch Foundation.
In 2023, Parker also shared that she wished Watts and Crudup well after learning they got married.
“I honestly of course wish them every happiness because that’s my son’s father,” she told The Guardian at the time. “So, I’m happy for them. I’m happy they found each other.”
Claire Danes
Crudup left Parker to pursue a relationship with Danes in 2003. Danes and Crudup eventually called it quits in 2007. Danes went on to welcome three kids with Hugh Dancy.
Danes briefly mentioned her and Crudup’s split in an interview in 2009.
“That was a choice I made to fall in love,” she explained to Blackbook. “It’s unpleasant to be cast in such an unflattering role [in the tabloids], but I just had to remain steadfast. I was living with the same kind of integrity that I had always lived with.”
Several years later, Danes and Crudup reunited at the NYU Tisch Gala in April 2025. The twosome were seen sharing a hug and chatting after Crudup walked over to her table, per a video shared by People.
Naomi Watts
Watts and Crudup met while filming Gypsy in 2017, one year after Watts split from Liev Schreiber, with whom she shares sons Sasha and Kai. The couple confirmed they got married in June 2023.

Fans didn’t expect to see Candice King and Steven Krueger find love years after finding fame in The Vampire Diaries universe.
King rose to fame playing Caroline Forbes on TVD from 2009 to 2017. Krueger, meanwhile, played the role of Josh Rosza in The Vampire Diaries spinoff, The Originals. During her time on The CW series, King started dating Joe King. The couple, who got married in 2014, expanded their family with daughters Florence in 2016 and Josephine in 2020.
Us Weekly broke the news in May 2022 that King filed for divorce from King. She later started spending time with Krueger at TVD fan conventions and cast reunions.
In December 2023, King subtly launched her romance with Krueger on social media when she uploaded a video that included a clip of them kissing. King and Krueger have since offered glimpses into their romance.
Keep scrolling to relive King and Krueger’s relationship timeline:
April 2023
Krueger shared a group photo that included King in Us‘ Inside a Day in My Life feature.
“We’ve all moved on to new projects, but we still jump at the opportunity to catch up any chance we get,” he told Us alongside a snap of him sitting next to Accola at dinner alongside their other former costars, including The Originals’ Charles Michael Davis.
That same month, Krueger hinted at his plans for parenthood, telling 26 Magazine, “A family is definitely in my future, as well.”
November 2023
“I’ve been dating. I am going to say that out loud. That feels very personal and new and interesting and super cool and casual to say out loud. But I have,” King said on an episode of her “Superbloom” podcast. “Not multiple people — only one. And I don’t even want to get into it.”
King hinted she had a “really nice person” in her life, adding, “This is not brand new. This is the most you are going to hear me talk about it. It is good. There’s a smile on my face and joy in my heart.”
December 2023
“I laughed. I cried. I laughed til I cried. I loved. Thanks for the dance 2023 🥂,” King wrote alongside the various videos from the year, including a brief clip of her and Krueger sharing a kiss.
January 2024
King took to Instagram Story to document her attempt to spot Krueger in the background of red carpet footage at the Emmys. The actress posted multiple clips of other celebrities being interviewed before she finally found — and zoomed in on — Krueger outside of the Peacock Theater in Los Angeles, California.
February 2024
The pair enjoyed a romantic trip to Paris, France.
April 2024
“Had the dreamiest time at @blackberry.mountain last week 🏔️ 🎣 🥃 🌲 swipe through for adventures and to see if what was rustling in the bushes was a Turkey 🦃 or a Bear 🐻 …. And it legit was ✌️,” King captioned an Instagram photo of her and Krueger posing for the camera.
June 2024
King uploaded several Instagram photos of Krueger spending time with her and her daughters while the actress was on location filming season 1 of We Were Liars.
October 2024
For Halloween, King and Krueger dressed up as Taylor Swift and Post Malone in the “Fortnight” music video. “Who uses typewriters anyway? #thetorturedboyfriendsdepartment 🖤🤍,” King captioned a clip via Instagram set to Swift’s Tortured Poets Department song.
December 2024
“December, you sure kept me on my toes 😂 From Mystic Falls to Paris to Florida… It’s been a beautiful adventure but I’m officially ready for that sleepy week between Christmas and New Years 👏 anyone else? ✋,” King wrote via Instagram alongside photos of her and Krueger kissing.
That same month, Krueger joined King and her two daughters — whom she shares with her ex-husband — on a trip to Florida.
May 2025
“I think 38 just might be my favorite year yet 🎂 ♥️ A couple of weeks ago @stevenakrueger gave me the best gift of all when he asked me to marry him. The privilege of getting older is much sweeter knowing I get to share it with you Steven. Thank you for asking me to dance through life with you. And thank you to everyone for the kind birthday wishes,” King wrote via Instagram.

Dancing With the Stars pros Emma Slater and Alan Bersten’s chemistry has heated up the ballroom floor —and beyond.
Slater and Bersten joined the ABC reality dancing competition series in 2012 and 2017, respectively, before pursuing their romantic relationship. Amid season 33 of the series in 2024, a source exclusively told Us Weekly that Slater and Bersten were “hooking up.”
While the pair remained quiet about their relationship status, Slater and Bersten sealed the rumors with a kiss during an April 2025 live show. Days later, Bersten reflected on him and Slater sending fans into a frenzy with their onstage smooch. “Did it go viral?” Bersten exclusively asked Us of the moment. “We’re just enjoying life.”
Before her romance with Bersten, Slater was married to fellow DWTS pro Sasha Farber from 2018 to 2023. Bersten, for his part, had a brief showmance with season 27 partner Alexis Ren.
Scroll down to see Slater and Bersten’s relationship timeline from the beginning:
October 2024
While revealing that Slater and Bersten were “hooking up,” an insider told Us that their romance is “not new, it’s ongoing.”
April 2025
Slater and Bersten sent fans into a spiral when they locked lips during a live DWTS show, to which he later confessed he was “a little bit” surprised it gained so much traction online. “It was an incredible tour and I’m sad that it came to an end,” he told Us days after the kiss. “But also there are so many good moments.”
May 2025
Slater traveled to New York City to cheer on Bersten as he completed the 2025 RBC Brooklyn Half marathon. “We did it!!!! My first half marathon! That was so hard! My official time was 1:38:43!” Bersten wrote via Instagram, alongside post-race snaps with Slater. “Shout out to all these incredible runners. So proud of you @dannydlawn and I’m so happy @theemmaslater was here to support me.” Slater later shared snaps of her holding Bersten via Instagram and gushed that she was “proud” of him.
After their vacation to the Big Apple, Slater and Bersten enjoyed a getaway to Hawaii. While showing fans a glimpse of their travels via Instagram, Bersten shared a snap of the twosome kayaking and one of Slater embracing Bersten from behind as they swam beside a waterfall. “Our first few days in Kauai! Truly unbelievable 🙏🏼,” Bersten wrote. “This is what happiness looks like to me.”
June 2025
Bersten and Slater collaborated for several playful videos, including one of them bobbing their head in the kitchen. “‘You guys are professional dancers, you should film videos together.’ The videos we film 😂😂,” they captioned a joint Instagram post.
July 2025
The couple packed on the PDA in a series of sweet selfies, with Bersten planting kisses on Slater’s cheek and neck. “Just a moment in time 💘,” she captioned the Instagram upload. Bersten gushed in the comments section, “I miss you already.”
Three weeks later, the pair were at it again, with Bersten sharing a shirtless photo of himself kissing Slater during a tubing outing along a river.

argos_summary: The piece compiles a wide array of celebrity romance updates, from on‑screen couples like Nina Dobrev and Ian Somerhalder of "The Vampire Diaries" to real‑life pairings such as Bradley Cooper and Gigi Hadid, Alan Bersten and Emma Slater, and Kylie Jenner with Timothée Chalamet. It also covers high‑profile relationships in reality TV, including Ben Affleck and Jennifer Lopez’s split over a shared home, and the evolving love stories on "Bachelor in Paradise". Additionally, the article touches on tennis stars’ personal lives—Serena Williams’ Met Gala appearance, Coco Gauff’s French Open win, and Nick Kyrgios’ reality‑TV venture—while noting Billy Crudup’s journey to marriage with Naomi Watts. Overall, the story offers a snapshot of current celebrity love affairs across entertainment, sports, and reality‑TV arenas.
